title: CloudSurf Software
description: CloudSurf Software is a company I founded in 2020 as a platform to build software for small businesses, collaborate with enthusiastic software engineers, and teach everything I know to anyone willing to learn.

title: Education Innovation Foundation
description: I founded Education Innovation Foundation in 2023 with a mission to empower and transform the lives of students in Nevada and across the United States through innovative educational initiatives.
